title: How to increase the voicemail record length
description:
This query increase the value to 100 sec for whole system. 


sippy=> insert into ivr_config (section, option, value, i_ivr_instance) values ('voicemail', 'maxmessagetimemsec', '100000', 1);
description_text:
This query increase the value to 100 sec for whole system.   
   
 sippy=> insert into ivr_config (section, option, value, i_ivr_instance) values ('voicemail', 'maxmessagetimemsec', '100000', 1);
